entry.title: babagha/jpd-express-error: jpd-express-error is a lightweight utility package designed to standardize error handling in Express microservices. It ensures consistent error responses, typed messages, and structured error propagation across your services.
entry.content: jpd-express-error is a lightweight utility package designed to standardize error handling in Express microservices. It ensures consistent error responses, typed messages, and structured error propagation across your services.

entry.title: outerbase/studio: A lightweight Database GUI in your browser. It supports connecting to Postgres, MySQL, and SQLite.

entry.title: arifaura/todo: Todo is a lightweight, user-friendly task management application designed to help users efficiently organize, track, and prioritize their daily tasks. Built with modern web technologies, this project emphasizes simplicity, ease-of-use, and performance, making task management seamless whether you're at home or on the go.
entry.content: Todo is a lightweight, user-friendly task management application designed to help users efficiently organize, track, and prioritize their daily tasks. Built with modern web technologies, this project emphasizes simplicity, ease-of-use, and performance, making task management seamless whether you're at home or on the go.

entry.title: TANA-7/LeadsTracker-ChromeExtension: Leads Tracker is a lightweight Chrome extension that helps you save and organize links easily. You can manually enter URLs or save the current tab with a single click. All data is stored locally using localStorage, ensuring privacy and quick access.
entry.content: Leads Tracker is a lightweight Chrome extension that helps you save and organize links easily. You can manually enter URLs or save the current tab with a single click. All data is stored locally using localStorage, ensuring privacy and quick access.

entry.title: canyon/3d-web-viewer: This project is a lightweight web application developed with ReactJS and TailwindCSS. It enables the visualization of 3D point cloud data and incorporates basic GIS viewing features.

entry.title: C-Teo/minerva: Minerva is a lightweight art portfolio website built with JavaScript, React, and Vite, designed for fast performance and a minimalistic aesthetic. It offers a sleek, responsive platform for artists to showcase their work and effortlessly share their creative journeys online.
